# progress

**Instance Property**

The upload or download progress of a document.

## Declaration

```swift
var progress: Progress? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is valid while [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument/State/progressAvailable] is set.

## Accessing document attributes

- **fileURL**: The file URL you use to initialize the document.
- **localizedName**: The localized name of the document.
- **fileType**: The file type of the document.
- **fileModificationDate**: The date and time your app last modified the document file.
- **documentState**: The current state of the document.
